snippet: Naval and police detectives have confirmed that they are investigating a group of Camp Pendleton Marines who are believed to have posed in homosexual pornographic movies and magazines.   At least two dozen Marines and perhaps as many as 200 other ...
lead_paragraph: Naval and police detectives have confirmed that they are investigating a group of Camp Pendleton Marines who are believed to have posed in homosexual pornographic movies and magazines. At least two dozen Marines and perhaps as many as 200 other military men were involved in what investigators described as a pornography ring.

headline.main: Pornography Is Investigated At Marine Base in California
